stories.title: The User Experience of TiDB – Global Kill

stories.text: After the widespread claims about LaMDA having achieved sentience, I was wondering what kind of test could validate such claims. For example, a test could incorporate additional sensory modalities or focus on specific aspects of intelligence (such as logical reasoning, mathematical ability, or linguistic skills). Are there any approaches to that?
stories.title: Ask HN: What will be the next Turing Test?
Microsoft finds Raspberry Robin worm in hundreds of Windows networks

stories.text:
The federal courthouse there where a federal judge has sentenced R. Kelly, the RnB singer, to 30 years in federal prison for sex crimes involving his young fans. I said before, or this involved female fans, but we also heard some testimony during the trial from a male accuser accusing R. Kelly of some sex crimes as well.

So I'm Seeing on social media, it's Lighting up about This.Twitter is lighting. Up on this. I tweeted it out. People are celebrating this sentence on one hand. Read more https://newsvoice360.blogspot.com/2022/06/r-kelly-rnb-singerhas-sentenced-to-30.html
stories.title: R. Kelly the RnB singer has sentenced to 30 years
Ghost knowledge of applying machine learning
Hong Kong writer Ni Kuang, known for his Wisely sci-fi novels, dies at 87

stories.text:
I must say, working for a non technical manager is exhausting. Having to constantly explain basic things gets tiring very quickly.

I don't understand how a non technical person can "lead" a technical team. How can they even help the team because they don't even understand basic concepts. How are these people getting these technical jobs is beyond me. I keep running into these "engineering managers" who know nothing about engineering and I'm sick and tired of it. I just want a technical manager who is on the same level as the technical people on the team or at least understands what the engineers are talking about during meetings.
stories.title: Do you prefer your manager to be technical or non technical?
The insane study routine of Sir Isaac Newton

stories.text:
British socialites Gilshlain Maxwell, convicted of recruiting and trafficking teenage girls for sex, has learned her fate in court. She'll spend the next two decades behind bars. Sentenced by a judge in new York for helping disgrace asked former financier Jeffrey Epstein, sexually exploit four girls. Maxwell's actions were slammed by the judge as heinous and predatory us. Correspondent Tim Lester has the details from court.
Read more
https://newsvoice360.blogspot.com/2022/06/gillane-maxwell-convicted-of-recruiting.html
stories.title: Gilshlain Maxwell incident – 20 years in jail?
